content:
elliottt commented on issue #5515:

Yes, they would be asserting the structure of the pseudo-instructions before the emit phase, unfortunately. I'll check to see that we've got adequate run-test coverage for this change before merging it :+1:

elliottt commented on issue #5515:

We have quite a few run tests that use fcvt_to_{us}int, so I think we're covered!
